parsed.explanation: Fixed several structural and content issues: 1) Removed nested BIBL tags within the second entry and flattened the structure to separate titles within the same BIBL element, 2) Removed nested BIBL tag in "de Amphitheatris" entry, 3) Changed PRICE tag to PRIZE tag for consistency, 4) Converted special Unicode characters to more standard representations (√º for ü, √† for †, ß for ß, ä for ä), 5) Converted & to & for proper XML encoding, 6) Corrected "groß" from encoded form.
